channel.title: Meeting on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Meeting on My New Hugo Site

item.title: ElmCity in-person meeting
item.description: Torontonian part of the team had an in-person meeting today. Pending approval of our Michigan colleagues, we have outlined several important guidelines concerning our future work. A summary of the discussion can be found here. In meantime we are spending the time before the Code Sprint dissecting MySpace and LibraryThing. It’s fun!

item.title: MarkUs IRC Meeting, Week 2
item.description:
The MarkUs team had their second IRC meeting earlier today.

Read our meeting notes

Looking forward to meeting all of you next week at the code sprint!

The MarkUs Team
